item.title: Ahead of Black Friday, HP Laptop with 17″ IPS Screen, i3 Chip and 1TB SSD Is Now 70% Off
item.content:encoded:
It’s not Black Friday yet, but Amazon has already rolled out a few serious laptop deals that shouldn’t be missed. Those looking for a powerful work or study partner should consider the 17.3-inch HP laptop (Intel Core i3, 1TB SSD, 16GB RAM) that’s now going at a 70% discount for a short time.

It normally would run you around $2,200, but this deal brings the price down to just $650, and that’s not the only offer here. You’re also getting an accessory bundle worth $240 thrown in for absolutely free! This laptop is also marked as an Amazon’s Choice product and has a 4.7-star rating, so grabbing it at this price feels like a steal.

See at Amazon

Bigger Screen, Better Performance

The price might make it seem like a basic option, but it’s far from that. It boasts a massive 17.3-inch diagonal high-resolution display with narrow bezels. You’re getting a large screen real estate to work on, plus solid visuals that make the content pop. The keyboard is slightly elevated using a new lift-hinge design, so typing long documents won’t make your wrists hurt by the end of the day.

There’s an 8-core Intel i3-N305 processor to ensure fast performance, plus 16 GB DDR4 high-bandwidth RAM for smoother multitasking. Storage is taken care of by a 1TB PCIe SSD, which gives you quick boot times and fast file access, plus sufficient space to have all your important files and content in one place.

The battery can last up to 8 hours on a single charge, which means you can go a full day without worrying about plugging it in. Connectivity options include Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.4, plus a wide range of ports for connecting your accessories. Speaking of accessories, the free bundle gets you a design mouse, a colorful gaming keyboard, Windows 11 Pro (pre-installed), and a data cable organizer. Getting the OS pre-installed means you will have instant access to a wide range of productivity features from the get-go, plus Microsoft’s new Copilot AI assistant, which you can also launch directly using the dedicated Copilot key on the keyboard.

All things considered, this laptop is made for both work and everyday use. It can support your most productive days without throwing a fit, and comes with a set of useful accessories that add even more value to the deal. Grab this 70% off discount before it expires for good.

item.title: DJI Liquidates Its Mic Mini at a Record Low, Noise Cancelling and HQ Audio Now Cost Peanuts
item.content:encoded:
Shooting high-quality video with exceptional vibrancy and just the right angles is just half the story. You need clean audio to get the message, excitement and even frustration across. Most cameras out there have built-in microphones but they are not always enough: If you want that professional audio that cuts through background chatter and reaches with exceptional clarity, it might be time for a proper wireless mic system.

DJI – one of our favorite go-to brands for cameras – also has a solid lineup of wireless microphones and we just spotted an option going for less. The DJI Mic Mini, which typically retails for $119, is now going for just $74 at Amazon, after a generous 38% discount. It’s the lowest price we’ve seen in the past 30 days; even Prime Day didn’t bring it this low. We recommend grabbing it sooner rather than later, as the offer might wrap up anytime now.

See at Amazon

Impressive Range With Two Noise Cancellation Modes

This setup gives you two transmitters and one receiver, so it’s perfect for when you’re shooting with more than one user. Each transmitter is small, lightweight, and can be worn/clipped easily. It doesn’t feel bulky or look unpleasant on camera. Despite its tiny size, it offers a maximum transmission range of 400 meters for stronger signals both indoors and outdoors. Recording in those busy streets and jam-packed cafeterias won’t be a problem, ever again.

You’re also getting two noise cancellation modes; basic and strong. The basic mode is ideal for relatively quieter environments, like your home, while the strong mode is more appropriate for noisier settings. It also comes with an automatic limiting feature that reduces volume spikes and maintains a consistent tone; your audience won’t be hit with an unexpected jumpscare mid-video.

Battery-wise, you’re looking at up to 10 hours of operating time on both the transmitters and the receiver. This is more than enough for longer shoots, and you can even go a couple of days without plugging them in. The DJI Mic Mini also plays well with a wide range of devices. Even without the receiver, you can pair the transmittor with DJI devices like the Osmo Pocket 3 and Osmo Action 5 Pro.

In the box, you’ll find two transmitters, one receiver, a mobile adapter, a camera audio cable, clip magnets, windscreens, a charging dock, and a carrying pouch. Keep in mind that the offer might end soon, so it’s best to grab it fast.

item.title: LEGO Clears Out Some Star Wars Sets, Ahsoka Tano’s Duel on Peridea Is Going for Peanuts
item.content:encoded:
If I try to think of brands that appeal to everyone across all ages and gender, the one that pops into my mind front and center has got to be LEGO. Whether you’re a kid or just a kid at heart, there is joy to be found in building a LEGO set. Assembling LEGO bricks piece by piece, can be a mindful, rewarding, and enjoyable activity. Then by the send of it, you have some cool Star Wars or Marvel toy to play with or display on your shelf.

The only catch is that LEGO sets can get pretty pricey, and when they do actually go on sale, it’s usually not by a lot or it sells out almost immediately. That’s what when a big sale does kick in, it’s hard to pass it up. Right now, this LEGO Star Wars Ahsoka Tano set depicting the duel on Peridea has dropped in price: With the 40% off, you end up saving $22 as the price comes down to just $33 (down from $55) for a limited time.

See at Amazon

From the Star Wars: Ahsoka Season 1 Finale

There are too many Star Wars LEGO sets to count, and even a small handful depicting scenes from the recent Disney Plus show Star Wars: Ahsoka. This set portrays Ahsoka Tano’s duel on Peridea against Grand Admiral Thrawn’s army from the final episode of the show’s first season.

The 382-piece set designed for ages eight and up includes five minifigures of characters from the show: We have Ahsoka Tano, Grand Admiral Thrawn, Morgan Elsbeth, Ezra Bridger and a Night Trooper. The buildable brick platform they fight on features three built-in turntables which can spin each minifigure allowing you to recreate their dynamic battle. You can even reenact Ezra’s leap off the platform with the launchpad.

The LEGO Builder app can help make the build even easier. View each step with a 3D digital version so you can get a better look at some of those weird angles that don’t print well in the instruction booklet. You can zoom in and rotate the model around even bookmark your progress so you can walkaway and come back later to complete your build.

Right now, the LEGO Star Wars Ahsoka Tano’s Duel on Peridea is discounted down to its lowest price yet of just $33.
